nodes.text: Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught

Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught is the seventh Digital Expansion to the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. The expansion was first announced on April 13, 2019 at the Community Cantina Tour held in Chicago, Illinois, and was released on October 22, 2019.

A considerable amount of story content was added with Onslaught, with new quest areas in the new Onderon and Mek-Sha. Also added were a new flashpoint on Corellia, and an operation on the jungle planet of Dxun.
Update 6.1 "Pinnacles of Power" was released on February 13, 2020, introducing a small expansion to the story and a brand new stronghold on the planet Alderaan.
6.1.2 The All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally

Update 6.1.2 was released on June 24, 2020 and introduced a new recurring event for swoop racing called the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally. It also added a new difficulty to the Onslaught operation "Nature of Progress".
Update 6.1.4 released on October 20, 2020 added a new annual event to game: The Feast of Prosperity. The new update includes the cooking event and a servant droid mini-game.

Update 6.2 was released on December 9, 2020 and introduced a new flashpoint named "The Spirit of Vengeance" exploring the Mandalorians' story. Besides the flashpoint, the update added a main story quest titled "Echoes of Oblivion," new login rewards, and a test mode for the new emote window. With the new update, old cutscenes from the base game Star Wars: The Old Republic were also revamped and improved.
Update 6.3 was released in April 27, 2021, introducing the flashpoint "Secrets of the Enclave" and Galactic Seasons, which builds upon the Login Rewards system introduced in Update 6.2.
